issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Improve distcp to support efficient restore to an earlier snapshot

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
This jira is to propose adding a check to distcp, when {{-diff s1 s2}} is passed, we need to ensure that s2 is newer than s1, otherwise, abort with a informative error message.

This is the result of my offline discussion with [~jingzhao] on HDFS-9820. Thanks Jing.
fields.summary: Distcp need to enforce the order of snapshot names passed to -diff

comments.body: Hi, [~yzhangal], I will upload a initial patch later.
Attach a initial patch from me, thanks review.

In addition, there is a method 
{{getSourceSnapshotPath(Path sourceDir, String snapshotName)}} you can use to replace two lines of code that compute snapshot path.

bq. the old behavior is that we fallback to regular distcp if sync failed, my suggested change would change the old behavior so no fallback would happen, I believe it's safer, do you agree?

Yes, agree. Let's return some error msg here.
Thanks [~yzhangal] for review. Update the latest for addressing the comments.
Update the patch for the latest comments, pending jenkins.
